entry.title: Some transcripts from Scaling Bitcoin 2016
entry.summary: The context provides links to various talks that were given at the Scaling Bitcoin conference in Milan. The links cover a range of topics, including fungibility overview, Mimblewimble, lightning network routing, Schnorr signatures, and fast difficulty adjustment. While the links are not exact transcripts, they do provide valuable information on each topic discussed at the conference. There is also a disclaimer that there may be typos or listening errors due to Bryan typing while listening to the talks.
